page.title: 13Leisure in Rawdon-Adults
page.content: Leisure activities for adults in the area are many and varied.{Sporting {activities-}golf courses in Rawdon and Horsforth,rugby union,football,table tennis,tennis and bowling clubs.Model yacht racing is held on Larkfield Tarn ,Rawdon.{Specialist and Action groups} include Aireborough Civic Society and the Aireborough and Horsforth Museum Society.{The Arts-}Rawdon Amateur Operatic Society,Association of Yorkshire Bookmen,Aireborough Scrabble Club and the Leeds Symphony Orchestra based at Trinity College.{Charities {and Welfare-}Rotary Club with a ladies section,Community Care Group.Rawdon Townswomen's Guild provides a common meeting ground for women. Details of all these groups and societies can be found at Rawdon Library,Micklefield Park.
